issue.title: [C++] Array validation should work on ArrayData
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10566). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Going from ArrayData to Array involves a MakeArray() call, which may trigger debug assertions. It should be possible to call validation directly on ArrayData.
